page.title: 06EMERGENCY SERVICES
page.content: THE MAJOR 999 SERVICES ALSO HAVE TO TRAVEL INTO THE GRID FROM OUTSIDE, USUALLY FROM RETFORD. THE NOTTINGHAMSHIRE FIRE SERVIE OPERATES FROM RETFORD,THIS DEPOT BEING THE CENTRE FOR THE WHOLE OF THE AREA. THERE ARE TWO APPLIANCES AND A RESCUE TENDER.IN THE EVENT OF A MAJOR INCIDENT IN THE GRID AREA, THE FIRE SERVICES WOULD BE ON THE SCENE WITHIN SEVEN TO EIGHT MINUTES. THE POLICE SERVICES ARE ALSO BASED IN RETFORD,THERE BEING NO LOCALLY BASED POLICE HOUSES SITUATED WITHIN THE GRID AREA. MEDICAL SERVICES ARE AGAIN SITUATED ON THE RETFORD AREA. THERE IS A HOSPITAL IN THE TOWN WHERE MINOR EMERGENCIES ARE ATTENDED TO BUT THERE ARE NO FACILITIES FOR TREATMENT OF MAJOR INJURIES.THE AMBULANCES HAVE TO TRAVEL TO THE AREA FROM RETFORD.
